subject: NBA Championship
Free Agents (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Entering the 2013-14 season, the N.B.A.’s upper class — which, on its lower end, includes both New York teams — has grown to include about half the league.
snippet: Entering the 2013-14 season, the N.B.A.’s upper class — which, on its lower end, includes both New York teams — has grown to include about half the league.
